alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 11:34PM AKST until January 01 at 8:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 8 PM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. Visibility as low as one half mile. * WHERE...Kuskokwim Delta Coast. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 8 PM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Blowing snow may significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will develop along the coast Monday morning along with increased winds. Snow and blowing will will persist through the afternoon before diminishing from south to north Monday evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
